A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I only gave this one star because RT doesn't count 1/2 or no-star ratings towards the average. This film is a deliberate desecration of the Star Wars franchise. The makers of this film not only hate Star Wars; they hate heroes\, they hate hope\, and they hate everything our culture has built. But I still have my Original Series DVDs\, and no one can take them away from me.
